content.text:
# San Diego Film Critics Society Award for Best Animated Film

The San Diego Film Critics Society Award for Best Animated Feature is an annual film award given by the San Diego Film Critics Society.
Winners
2003-2008
{| class="wikitable" width="95%" cellpadding="5"
|-
!width="100"|Year
!width="300"|Film
!width="300"|Director(s)
|-
| align="center"|2003 || The Triplets of Belleville(Les triplettes de Belleville) || Sylvain Chomet
|-
| align="center"|2004 || The Incredibles || Brad Bird
|-
| align="center"|2005 || 'Howl's Moving Castle'(Hauru no ugoku shiro) || Hayao Miyazaki
|-
| align="center"|2006
| colspan="2"|
|-
| align="center"|2007 || Ratatouille  ||  Brad Bird
|-
| align="center"|2008 || WALL-E  || Andrew Stanton
|-
|}
